name: Yazan Alkamal
summary: Aspiring AI Engineer with a passion for artificial intelligence, machine learning, and solving real-world challenges. A McKinsey Forward Alumni with strong leadership, problem-solving, and analytical skills, committed to continuous learning and collaboration. Dedicated to building intelligent systems that optimize processes and drive meaningful innovation.

experience.title: AI Software Engineer
bullets: Developing a real-world AI project embedded directly into Lucidya's production environment.
Designing high-impact AI features that integrate seamlessly into live business workflows.
Turning a graduation project into a high-impact, deployable product used in a real SaaS ecosystem.

experience.title: AI Engineer
bullets: Optimized model performance and accuracy for deployment in a real-world retail setting.

Delivered a proof-of-concept system showcasing measurable improvements in recommendation quality.
